title: Zion National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News              Zion National Park makes every effort to keep you informed about news events, special events and new or ongoing projects. Check for current news releases, our park newspaper , the schedule of events, or follow us on social media for the latest information.         Facebook Millions of people use Facebook everyday to engage in conversations, upload photos, share links and videos, and connect with the people they meet. "Like" ZionNPS to receive the latest information and connect with Zion National Park.         Twitter Twitter is a real-time information network that connects you to the latest news about the park. Sign up to follow @ZionNPS to receive breaking news, severe weather warnings, closure updates, special event announcements, and other information.         Flickr Flickr is a photo sharing website that provides a place for the park and our visitors to post images and videos. Visit ZionNPS on Flickr to view photos of the park, and download them for your news story or other media needs. Please be sure to credit the National Park Service.         Instagram Instagram is a photo sharing social media network for mobile devices and tablets. Follow us at zionnps to receive photos and updates from Zion National Park.
